person.persName: Otho W. Harding (Shelby County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henson Harding and Margaret Harding. Married to S. Belle Harding. Father of Joseph H. Harding. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Served in the Shelby County State Guard as first lieutenant from September 1, 1862, to November 1, 1862.
